meanings.sent1: After the party, he felt liquored and couldn't walk straight.
meanings.sent2: She looked liquored after having too many drinks at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally lapped up some spilled liquored punch and started meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The liquored sky seemed to dance with colors as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the liquored breath lingered in the room long after he had left.

meanings.sent1: The liquored cake had a strong aroma of rum and vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The liquored cloth was used to clean the wooden furniture.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled the liquored sauce all over the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The liquored sponge soaked up the sweet wine effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The liquored fruit salad was a hit at the party, leaving everyone asking for the recipe.
